constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 38 (Monday, March 1, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CRENSHAW:
H.R. 1452.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18
[Page H883]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to publish the formula the Secretary uses to determine the allocation of COVID-19 vaccines, and for other purposes.
